title: black screen
body:
anyone else getting a black screen like this. I've waited like a hour and noting happened could anyone help?

https://gyazo.com/3a8ba176cc462c89c95680c0c37868ab

replies.body: I believe that the dim screen can happen if there's a message trying to tell you something, but is being blocked from appearing.  Run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your security settings are configured to allow the patcher to function.  I hope that helps!
